messages.message:
I uploaded a medical claim document to the document summarization pre-built app and it got classified as other and had no summary field. However, when I just asked converse to provide a summary of the document it was able to provide a perfect summary.

The document was just a table that had info like the claim date, the total amount, and amount i had to pay, plus a few more fields.
There is also a draft medical summary app @avi

Can you share the doc mentioned with me, @Shubham, and @debstuti.das? We need to investigate this since I thought we excited the flow classification step to ensure no docs get classified as other. @Shubham @debstuti.das, please can you check this out next week?

Could you also please confirm that this was the doc summarisation app on prod?
